lead_paragraph: At least six militants infiltrated an air base, digging themselves in and engaging in a dayslong gun battle with India’s security forces before they were killed.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Team From Pakistan Joins Investigation Into Militant Attack
headline.main: India Lets Pakistani Team Examine Site of January Attack by Militants

snippet: At least six militants infiltrated an air base, digging themselves in and engaging in a dayslong gun battle with India’s security forces before they were killed.
abstract: India's National Investigation Agency permits Pakistani security officials to examine scene of militant attack that claimed lives of seven Indian soldiers and six fighters in January.
